- Exterior wall: green stucco/painted concrete foundation; base showing minor paint wear at the bottom.
- Crawlspace ventilation: multiple rectangular foundation vents along the base of the wall; appear unobstructed.
- Grading/drainage: grass area against foundation; no visible grading slope or downspout discharge shown; ensure water drains away from the wall.
- Window: ground-level window with white trim; frame and sill appear intact; no visible cracks or moisture staining.
- Utilities: small vertical pipe/valve near left side of wall; no leaks evident in photo.
